problem.markdown:
>>A stiffer building will deflect ____ a flexible building:<< (x) less than ( ) more than ( ) the same as
[explanation] Stiffness is a measure of the amount of deflection expected under a given load. A stiffer system will deflect less than a more flexible system. Shorter, wider buildings and buildings made of materials that have a higher modulus of elasticity value will be stiffer. [explanation]
